    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_106657</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Measurement of acceleration using a trolley and a light gate</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Messen der Beschleunigung mit einer Laufkatze und
einem hellen Gatter</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mesure de l'accélération à l'aide d'un chariot
et d'une porte légère</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Medida do acceleration usando um trole e uma 
porta clara</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Misura di accelerazione per mezzo di un carrello 
e di un cancello chiaro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μέτρηση της ταχύτητας που χρησιμοποιεί ένα καροτσάκι 
και μια ελαφριά πύλη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Medida de la aceleración usando una carretilla y
una puerta ligera</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a laboratory set-up for measuring acceleration using a single light gate and a trolley with an interrupt card.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Acceleration</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">interrupt card</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light gate</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Measurement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">trolley</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">velocity time</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt eine Laborinstallation für
messende Beschleunigung mit einem einzelnen hellen Gatter und einer 
Laufkatze mit einer Unterbrechung Karte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre une installation de 
laboratoire pour l'accélération de mesure à l'aide d'une porte 
légère simple et d'un chariot avec une carte d'interruption.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra uma instalação do 
laboratório para o acceleration de medição usando uma única porta 
clara e um trole com um cartão da interrupção.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra una messa a punto del
laboratorio per accelerazione di misurazione per mezzo di singolo 
cancello chiaro e di un carrello con una scheda di interruzione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει εργαστηριακή οργάνωση για
τη μέτρηση της ταχύτητας χρησιμοποιώντας μια ενιαία ελαφριά πύλη
και ένα καροτσάκι με διακόπτει την κάρτα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra una disposición del 
laboratorio para la aceleración que mide usando una sola puerta 
ligera y una carretilla con una tarjeta de la interrupción.</string>
          </description>
